mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.content, c.reg_date, c.mod_date, c.parent_id, c.depth, c.seq, c.article_id, u.username, u.user_id from comment c, user u where c.delete_yn = 'N' and c.user_id = u.user_id and c.article_id = #{articleId} order by c.parent_id asc, c.depth asc, c.seq asc

select c.content, c.reg_date, c.mod_date, c.likes, c.parent_id, c.depth, c.seq, c.article_id from comment c where c.delete_yn = 'N' and c.article_id = #{articleId} order by c.parent_id desc, c.depth desc, c.seq desc limit 1
select ifnull(max(seq),0) from comment where parent_id = #{parentId} and depth = #{depth}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(content, parent_id, depth, seq, user_id, article_id) values(#{content}, #{parentId}, #{depth}, #{seq}, #{userId}, #{articleId})
mapper.update: update comment set delete_yn = 'Y' where comment_id = #{commentId}
